results.text: Is trapped in a giant spider web (it returns in 1d4 rounds)
Crashes through the ceiling and gets up, somehow unhurt
Is locked in a rotted wardrobe full of very outdated clothing
Is tied up in a rope that hangs from a hook in the ceiling
Runs in being chased by a random encounter creature
Is in a barrel of pickled herring; the stench is awful
Gets tossed through an extraplanar portal that snaps shut
Frantically digs out of a shallow grave in the ground
Is stuck inside a mirror that releases them upon shattering
Is the lone survivor of another team of 0-level crawlers
Touched a teleportation trap in another far-flung location
Is a 'statue' whose petrification finally wears off after years
Is standing directly behind the next door the PCs open
Is stuck in a pair of rusty wall manacles on short chains
Is tied to a roasting spit over a fire; the cook will return soon
Crashes down the hall, at first sounding like a monster
Is a lone escapee from a group of prisoners held elsewhere
Took a wrong turn at the path to town and just kept going
Is amongst the enemies, disguised as one of their own!
Came straight from town! Gain +1 random piece of gear
